free_text.Remarque: Cours théorique de 4 après-midis sur  une semaine et de 1 journée en laboratoire durant le semestre pour la partie pratique.
free_text.Forme d'enseignement: Cours ex cathedra, exercices et travaux pratiques
free_text.Contenu: [b]Drug screening and the drug discovery process [/b][br/][li]Introduction (Turcatti 2h) [br/][li]Compounds to screen [br/][li]Assay development [br/][li]Assay automation and validation [br/][li]Screening [br/][li]Hits validation [br/][li]Description of post-screening steps [br/][li]Selected case studies from the EPFL screening platform [br/][li]Practical work (2 days)

free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: The students will go through the main screening steps, from the design of an assay to its validation in a high throughput-compatible format. The necessary technologies and approaches will be introduced for performing a representative experimental example.
